import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-about-section', templateUrl: './about-section.component.html', styleUrls: ['./about-section.component.scss'] }) export class AboutSectionComponent { }
Shiba Inu Dog Breed

The Shiba Inu is the smallest of the six original and distinct spitz breeds of dog from Japan. A small, agile dog that copes very well with mountainous terrain, the Shiba Inu was originally bred for hunting.
